mapper.select: SELECT *, (SELECT noticeNo FROM NOTICE WHERE noticeNo < #{noticeNo} ORDER BY noticeNo DESC LIMIT 1) AS noticePrev, (SELECT noticeNo FROM NOTICE WHERE noticeNo > #{noticeNo} ORDER BY noticeNo LIMIT 1) AS noticeNext FROM NOTICE WHERE noticeNo = #{noticeNo};
mapper.update: UPDATE NOTICE SET noticeReadcount = noticeReadcount+1 WHERE noticeNo = #{noticeNo}
